sourcesContent:
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { RouterModule } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ standalone: true, imports: [RouterModule], selector: 'app-root', template: `
{{ title }}

Welcome to {{ title }}

This is a modern Angular application built with Nx and styled with Tailwind CSS.

`, styles: [] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'Angular Web Application'; }
